About

I am a software engineer that specializes in build first, full stack development development. Specializing at engineering beautiful solutions from start to finish. Ambitious, attentive to detail, and the ability to quickly to solve problems. Experience mentoring junior developers, working with stakeholders and designers, project management, and managing other developers. Excellent communication skills, strong documentation skills, and excited to work in a team environment. Comfortable and excited to learning new technology, standards, and procedures while upholding best practices. Knowledgable in full stack web development, responsive front end, and native Android development.
code for coffee

This is the professional blog of James Traver, yet another software engineer and business cat afficiando.
